C

com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.emailserver - package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.emailserver
This package contains the interfaces and base classes for mail servers.
com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.emailserver.dumbster - package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.emailserver.dumbster
This package contains the classes that implement support for Dumbster mail servers.
com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.emailserver.greenmail - package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.emailserver.greenmail
This package contains the classes that implement support for Greemail mail servers.
com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.emailserver.mojo - package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.emailserver.mojo
This package contains the classes that implement the plug-in's Mojos.
com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.emailserver.subethasmtp - package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.emailserver.subethasmtp
This package contains the classes that implement support for SubEtha SMTP mail server.
